name: Anthony McMILLIAN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant
name_abbreviation: McMillian v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Anthony McMILLIAN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of October, 2004, the Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole’s appeal is dismissed as moot and the application for vacatur is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
861 A.2d 262
Anthony McMILLIAN, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellant.
No. 102 MAP 2004.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 25, 2004.
